channel.title: Weaken NPC Defence?
channel.description:
Base is Devo 7
Let's say you're a new player that joined the server, and you decided to attack a rat. You'll be wearing a bronze longsword and a wooden shield and hitting 0s for about 10-15 seconds and then hit a 1 then you have the rat hitting 1s and 2s and owning you 2-3 times before you kill it.
How do I make it easier for you to hit on the rat?

item.title: Weaken NPC Defence?
item.dc:creator: @ferasownz12 ferasownz12
